improvement_list.improvement_desc: Potential division by zero. Add a check to ensure y is not zero before the division.
The value of x could become very small, which might lead to performance issues. Consider adding an early exit condition to the loop.
Unreachable code path. The loop always completes and the final value of z is never used.
Control flow oddity: there is no exit condition for the loop that will result in a division by zero error.
